snippet: Lindsey Vonn declared herself ready to race for the first time in 10 months and said she would return to competition in a World Cup downhill Friday.
abstract: Lindsey Vonn declares herself ready to race for the first time in 10 months and said she would return to competition in upcoming World Cup downhill.
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn declared herself ready to race for the first time in 10 months and said she would return to competition in a World Cup downhill Friday.

headline.main: Vonn Set to Race for First Time in 10 Months
